com.rift.coad.lib.thread
Class CoadunationThreadGroup

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.thread.CoadunationThreadGroup

public class CoadunationThreadGroup
extends java.lang.Object

This object is responsible for controlling the creation and administration of a grouping of threads.

Nested Class Summary
 class CoadunationThreadGroup.ThreadList
          This object contains the list of threads in memory for a grouping.
